name: Babygirl
greetingText: You really have a pretty face btw!
wishText: May you live to achieve your dreams! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Enjoy your day and Keep on smiling.....
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Baby, I really care about you, like genuinely.
replayText: Just click to rewatch and smile as you do, signed Your grace.
